product_overview: ADmyBRAND Insights is a modern, responsive analytics dashboard designed for marketing agencies and their clients to monitor campaign performance and marketing insights. Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, it provides interactive visualizations, real-time simulated data updates, and advanced data tables for comprehensive marketing analytics.
core_goals: Provide marketing agencies and clients with real-time, actionable insights into campaign performance through interactive and visually appealing dashboards.
Ensure a responsive and accessible user experience across devices including mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Deliver a modular and maintainable codebase leveraging modern technologies such as Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Recharts.
Support key performance monitoring through metric cards, various chart types, and detailed campaign data tables with sorting, filtering, and pagination.
Facilitate performance trend tracking and marketing channel analysis for data-driven decision making.
key_features: Responsive Dashboard Layout with collapsible sidebar and mobile-optimized header for easy navigation.
Metric Cards displaying key performance indicators including value, percentage change, and trend icons.
Multiple Interactive Chart Components including line charts for revenue trend, bar charts for traffic sources, and donut charts for device distribution visualization.
Advanced Campaign Performance Data Table with sortable columns, search, filtering, and pagination features.
Simulated real-time data refresh functionality ensuring up-to-date insights.
Modern, clean UI design with branded color palette and smooth animations for an engaging user experience.
Use of TypeScript interfaces for strict typing and maintainability.
Integration of Lucide React icon library for customizable, beautiful icons.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the home page and is automatically redirected to the dashboard.
User can navigate through the collapsible sidebar to access different dashboard sections (metrics, charts, campaign data).
Dashboard displays key metrics in card format summarizing critical KPIs with trend indicators.
User interacts with charts to visualize revenue trends over 30 days, traffic sources by channel, and device distribution percentages.
User can explore campaign performance in the data table, using sorting, searching, filtering, and pagination to analyze specific campaigns.
On mobile or tablet devices, the layout adjusts responsively with an optimized header and sidebar for ease of use.
User triggers data refresh for real-time updates and visual confirmations of data changes.
validation_criteria: Dashboard must maintain full responsiveness across defined breakpoints (mobile to large desktop) with consistent UI and UX.
All metric cards accurately reflect the underlying mocked data and display correct percentage changes and icons.
Charts must render correctly with tooltips, axis labels, legends, and respond interactively to user input.
Data table functionalities—sorting, filtering, searching, pagination—must operate smoothly without errors.
Real-time simulated data refresh triggers visual updates to charts and metrics within an acceptable timeframe.
Codebase must pass ESLint, TypeScript strict type checks, and Prettier formatting consistently.
Accessibility standards must be met including ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation, and readable text contrast.
Build and deployment pipelines should successfully deploy the application to platforms like Vercel without runtime errors.
